pages.text: $(li)The Iron Golem is a powerful and big neutral mob that will defend $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) from aggressive creatures.$(br)$(li)They can be made with four $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/iron_block)Iron Blocks$(/l) and one $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin)Carved Pumpkin$(/l) or found in the $(l:patchouli:villagers/villagers)Villages$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/iron_ingot)Iron Ingots$(/l) and $(l)Poppies$().
